content: {"locationId": "7738", "organizationId": "6429", "name": "New Life Deliverance Temple", "address1": "112 Halifax Dr", "address2": "", "city": "Saint Helena Island", "state": "SC", "zipCode": "29920", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "32.3951833", "longitude": "-80.5645686", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "English, Sign Language (ASL), Spanish", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "THE Mission  The mission of the New Life Deliverance Temple Food Bank  is to provide a resource for healthy food to underserved young men, women, and children of our Gullah island community, and all those entrusted to our care.  Our VISION is to ensure our community has a resource to obtain necessary and healthy food when they are hungry.   Our GUIDING PRINCIPLE is from the Word of God which commands us to care for those in need. Matthew 25:35 \"For I was hungry and you gave me something to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink, I was a stranger and you invited me in\".", "notes": "Please check out our Facebook page for monthly announcements about our food bank distribution dates and visiting presenters for our Community Information classes. There is also more information about our food bank on our churches website too! Find out more at newlifedt.com. We are a non-profit organization and appreciate your support!", "contactName": "New Life Deliverance Temple Food Bank", "contactPhone": "843-838-3221", "contactEmail": "info@newlifedt.com", "servicePrograms": "Food Distribution, Meal Delivery, Health and Wellness, Financial, and Community Education", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, Curbside Pickup / Drive Through, Dietary Menu Options, Grocery / Client Choice, Home Delivery Service, Indoor Service, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Outdoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Household Products, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Sit Down Meals, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 56, "regionName": "Lowcountry Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "5fb3a382-bcd1-479f-a540-43f27ab71b53.png", "website": "https://lowcountryfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Wednesday 6:00 PM-8:00 PM", "Wednesday 6:00 PM-8:00 PM", "Wednesday 6:00 PM-8:00 PM", "Wednesday 6:00 PM-8:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
